author: Michael A. Pollock
title: If Market Volatility Is Back, Are You Ready?
text:
As stocks have rebounded from a scary early February slide, the up and down may be foreshadowing a new, more-volatile period for markets.
Is your fund portfolio ready?
Advisers say there is no reason to abandon a long-term investing strategy because of a bout of turbulence like early Februaryâ€™s, when stocks dropped 10% in 10 trading days.... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
